title: Saigo no Kuushuu: Kumagaya
synopsis: The central character is a 7 year old girl called Sachiko.  She has just lost her immediate family in the firebombing of Tokyo and takes the train to her uncleâ€™s family in Kumagaya in Saitama Prefecture.
